channel.title: CVE Feed for Ashraf -- XLTab – Accordions and Tabs for Elementor Page Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ashraf -- XLTab – Accordions and Tabs for Elementor Page Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-47375|2024-10-07T13:16:08.389Z -- ashraf -- xltab%20%E2%80%93%20accordions%20and%20tabs%20for%20elementor%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ashraf XLTab – Accordions and Tabs for Elementor Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects XLTab – Accordions and Tabs for Elementor Page Builder: from n/a through 1.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-47375|2024-10-05T15:14:55.530Z -- ashraf -- xltab%20%E2%80%93%20accordions%20and%20tabs%20for%20elementor%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ashraf XLTab – Accordions and Tabs for Elementor Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects XLTab – Accordions and Tabs for Elementor Page Builder: from n/a through 1.3.
